item.title: Twitter Bootstrap typeahead and ajax
item.description: Typeahead is a basic, easily extended plugin for quickly creating elegant typeaheads with any form text input. Working with Twitter Bootstrap. Multiple options, are not explained in details on project website. Soâ€¦ Quick example of usage $('.typeahead').typeahead({ source: function (query, process) { return $.get('/typeahead', { query: query }, function (data) { return process(data); }); } });
